title: FS: Old Timey Turn of the Century Baseball Postcard Lot - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: Old Timey Turn of the Century Baseball Postcard Lot - SOLD
posts.post_content:
All forms of payment accepted. PM over post.

Available today a lot of 5 comic baseball postcards. Well used but in tact. No idea as to value so I'll go $5 ea. + free shipping.

SOLD

Thanks for looking,
Tony

Hi Tony,
I will take them-

Tim
